Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Ainsley's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Ainsley and Gus , two members of Maggie 's group, are introduced to Daryl , who briefly held Maya hostage. Maya explains that the place they were staying in was set on fire, and that Jen and Billy didn't make it out, while Matty was killed by something in the woods. She didn't see who did it, but Gus is certain the Reapers are responsible. Maggie asks about Hershel , to which Ainsley says that he was found by Kim , but she hasn't seen either one since. The conversation is cut short when Gus is abruptly shot in the throat with a silenced weapon. The group runs for cover as the unknown assailant takes pot shots at them. As Daryl and Maggie sneak through the woods, Ainsley has been shot in the stomach. Unfortunately, Daryl and Maggie can't help her, as they both agree that it's a trap and she dies of her wounds.
Death[]: Killed By Pope (Caused) The Attacker Pope sends a Reaper out to hunt down Maggie's group. After the Attacker arrives in the woods, he discovers their location and shoots Ainsley through the stomach. Given her brain was not destroyed, she may have reanimated later.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Ainsley has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Name: Ainsley
